__e: Y- you know what really hurts, Peg? It's the fact that you didn't even bother--
I mean, when it's not easy when it's complicated, when it hurts.
Because however painful that would be, it couldn't be as painful as not knowing.
I know that it hurts, but I'm only trying to make sure someone pays for your parents' deaths.
I know that it's very painful,but I need to know what happened.
Yes, when we lost touch it was painful, but something really good came out of it.
He knows it's so painful I won't be able to wash it for some time.
I just knew it was something beautiful and painful and right.
And, yes, getting it out is a painful, important first step.
I do them 'cause it would hurt too much not to.
You've no idea how painful it is to keep on doing something and keep on doing something even though you know it's wrong, but... ..you just can't stop.
And I know you of all people know how painful it is to watch your family walk away.
So I know how painful it might have been for my dad to just tell me the truth.
You must understand that to me this doesn't make sense, this is ridiculous as well as painful for me.
Well, I saw you with her that day at your office, and it's like I could feel how painful it was for you.
Maybe what you think is the truth is less painful than what really happened.
And what could be more painful than having to tell your child that you're going to die?
Do you really think Anything could be more painful Than killing my own mother
